      • unzipFile

        public static void unzipFile(File zipFile,
             File outputFloder)
                      throws ZipException,
                             IOException

        Unzip a file into a folder

        Parameters:
        zipFile -
        outputFloder - must exists. WARNING: Contents will be removed before unzip
        Throws:
        IOException
        ZipException
        IllegalArgumentException - if zipFile is not a file or outputFloder doesn't exists or is read-only

      • zipFolder

        public static void zipFolder(File rootFolder,
             File targetFile)
                      throws IOException

        Create a zip file which will contains all contents of a folder

        Files will be use relative path to rootFolder

        Parameters:
        rootFolder - rootFolder (must be an existing folder)
        targetFile - final file (must not exists)
        Throws:
        IOException
        IllegalArgumentException - if there are any problem in parameters

      • getWritableFolder

        public static File getWritableFolder(File baseFolder,
                     String baseName)

        Look for a folder on a baseFolder starts with baseName which is writable.

        The pattern is: baseFolder/baseName.0000 where 000 it's a counter.

        Parameters:
        baseFolder - existing and writable folder
        baseName - start of new folder
        Returns:
        new folder
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if base folder is not a writable folder
        IllegalStateException - if can't found a suitable folder

      • getNewWritableFolder

        public static File getNewWritableFolder(File baseFolder,
                        String baseName)

        Create a new folder on a baseFolder starts with baseName which is new and writable.

        The pattern is: baseFolder/baseName.0000 where 000 it's a counter.

        Parameters:
        baseFolder - existing and writable folder
        baseName - start of new folder
        Returns:
        new folder
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if base folder is not a writable folder
        IllegalStateException - if can't found a suitable folder

      • getNewFileName

        public static File getNewFileName(File baseFolder,
                  String name)

        Create File instance for a new file on a baseFolder starts with baseName.

        The pattern is: baseFolder/baseName.0000.ext where 000 it's a counter.

        This no create the file into the file system.

        Parameters:
        baseFolder - existing and writable folder
        name - start of new file
        Returns:
        new folder
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if base folder is not a writable folder
        IllegalStateException - if can't found a suitable folder

                 File basePath)

        Return path as relative from basePath only if basePath is an ancestor of path:

        Parameters:
        path -
        basePath -
        Returns:
        See Also:
        FilenameUtils.getRelativeTo(String, String)
